entities.name: galleons
entities.description: Galleons are a type of currency mentioned in the conversation between Ron and Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: sickles
entities.description: Sickles are a type of currency mentioned in the conversation between Ron and Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends, mentioned as dropping boxes and making a rude hand gesture at Fred.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is Ron's twin brother, mentioned as being the target of Ron's rude hand gesture.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a character who appears in the scene and scolds Ron for his behavior.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's sister, mentioned as asking her mother if she can have a Pygmy Puff.

entities.name: pygmy puffs
entities.description: Pygmy Puffs are a type of pet mentioned in the conversation between Ginny and Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is a character who appears at the end of the scene, hurrying up the street alone.

relationships.description: Ron makes a rude hand gesture at Fred, which is spotted by Mrs. Weasley.
Mrs. Weasley scolds Ron for his behavior and threatens to jinx his fingers together.
Ginny asks her mother if she can have a Pygmy Puff, and Mrs. Weasley responds warily.
Draco Malfoy is seen hurrying up the street alone and passing by Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.
